com.facebook.buck.jvm.java

Interface OutOfProcessJavacConnectionInterface


  • public interface OutOfProcessJavacConnectionInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int buildWithClasspath(String compilerClassNameForJarBackedJavacMode, Map<String,Object> serializedJavacExecutionContext, String invokingRuleBuildTargetAsString, List<String> options, List<String> setOfSafeAnnotationProcessorsAsList, List<String> sortedSetOfJavaSourceFilePathsAsStringsAsList, String pathToSrcsListAsString, String workingDirectory, com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.AbstractJavacOptions.AbiGenerationMode abiGenerationMode)
      This is interface that will be used to perform out of process compilation.

    • Method Detail

      • buildWithClasspath

        int buildWithClasspath(String compilerClassNameForJarBackedJavacMode,
                       Map<String,Object> serializedJavacExecutionContext,
                       String invokingRuleBuildTargetAsString,
                       List<String> options,
                       List<String> setOfSafeAnnotationProcessorsAsList,
                       List<String> sortedSetOfJavaSourceFilePathsAsStringsAsList,
                       String pathToSrcsListAsString,
                       String workingDirectory,
                       com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.AbstractJavacOptions.AbiGenerationMode abiGenerationMode)
        This is interface that will be used to perform out of process compilation.
        Parameters:
        compilerClassNameForJarBackedJavacMode - String value of compilerClassName for Jar-backed mode, or null
        serializedJavacExecutionContext - JavacExecutionContext converted to String
        invokingRuleBuildTargetAsString - BuildTarget converted to String
        options - Immutable list of string options
        setOfSafeAnnotationProcessorsAsList - ImmutableSet represented as a List
        sortedSetOfJavaSourceFilePathsAsStringsAsList - ImmutableSortedSet represented as List of String objects.
        pathToSrcsListAsString - Path represented as String.
        workingDirectory - Path represented as String, or null.
        Returns:
        Resulting code, 0 if build finished without issues, non-zero otherwise.
